content: small butterfly you need oddments of cotton yarn i used green and white crochet hook size 3 5mm/size e fiberfill tapestry needle pipecleaners stitches you need single_crochet=single_crochet chain=chain stitch double_crochet=double_crochet slp st=slip_stitch every row in paper is one round in your work body chain 2 6 single_crochet to 2nd chain from hook you can join rounds if you want but it isn´t necessary 2 single_crochet to every single_crochet *single_crochet 2 2sc to one single_crochet* repeat to the end of the round single_crochet to every single_crochet repaet 3 rounds *single_crochet 1 decrease* repeat to the end of the round single_crochet 4 decrease single_crochet 2 decrease stuff single_crochet to every single_crochet repeat 8 rounds stuff decrease every single_crochet until you have 1 single_crochet left cut yarn wings make 4 chain 2 6 single_crochet to 2nd chain from hook 2 single_crochet to every single_crochet 3sc 2 single_crochet to one single_crochet make 7 double_crochet to nex seven single_crochet 2sc to one single_crochet 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet to one single_crochet *2 single_crochet to every stitch* *_* repeat this to the end of the round make one slp st cut yarn sew the wing as illustraded below and embroider face make the antennas take a 5 cm 2inch piece of pipe cleaner push stem through center of butterfly head ©mintsu all rights reserved you may sell toys made from this pattern but don´t sell pattern itself
